summary: Implements a Keras layer that computes the maximum value across all three spatial dimensions of a 5‑D tensor, collapsing the spatial axes into a single feature per channel and optionally preserving singleton dimensions.
business_intent: Provides a convenient way to down‑sample 3‑D feature maps in convolutional neural networks, reducing model size and enabling translation‑invariant feature extraction for tasks such as volumetric image analysis or video processing.
